page.description: The A5.GET_MASTER_NAME() method returns the name of the master database if the workstation is shadowed. Returns the Master database, or null if current database is not Network Optimized.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following script checks to see whether the user is using a master or shadowed database.
section.example: dim Master_name as C Master_name = a5.Get_Master_Name() if (Master_name = "") then ui_msg_box("STOP", "You are NOT in a Shadow database." +crlf(2) + "You can only run this operation from a Shadow.", UI_STOP_SYMBOL+UI_OK) END End if
